site_info.name: Collaborative for Frontier Finance
site_info.tagline: Unlocking capital and growth for early stage enterprises.
site_info.description: The Collaborative for Frontier Finance is a multi-stakeholder initiative that aims to increase access to capital for small and growing businesses in emerging markets

hero.headline: We are building a better financial ecosystem for small and growing businesses in frontier markets.
hero.subheadline: The Collaborative for Frontier Finance is a multi-stakeholder initiative that aims to increase access to capital for small and growing businesses in emerging markets

how_it_works.title: How does the Collaborative FOR FRONTIER FINANCE work?
how_it_works.description: The Collaborative for Frontier Finance works with diverse stakeholders – including fund managers, funders, and fieldbuilders – to accelerate financing solutions that target SGBs. We aim to set a common action agenda for SGB finance; to test and scale promising financing models; and to facilitate the flow of capital to the SGB market. With a bias to action, CFF works with stakeholders to identify, co-design and launch initiatives – or specific solutions that table SGB financing challenges - that are too complex for any one stakeholder to launch on their own.

who_involved.title: Who's INVOLVED IN the Collaborative for Frontier Finance?
who_involved.description: With input from 80+ fund managers, funders, and fieldbuilders over the past year, the Collaborative for Frontier Finance is a multi-stakeholder initiative.

newsletter.title: Want to stay in the loop?
newsletter.description: Sign up here to receive occasional news and updates from the Collaborative.
